page.title: 07RECREATION IN HASTINGS
page.content: Hastings has a variety of entertainment and recreation. The sports centre provides swimming, squash, badminton and facilities for most indoor sport. In the town centre is the cricket ground. On the sea front are many amenities which have developed because of tourism including arcades, bingo, discos and fast food establishments. There is also a small ice rink. There is the White Rock Theatre. Hastings also has a cinema in the town centre. Alexandra Park has tennis courts, bowling and a boating lake as well as formal and informal gardens. The town has many clubs and societies and most interests are catered for.
